== Installation

[source,bash]
----
# npm 6.x
npm create vite@latest my-vue-app --template vue-ts

# npm 7+, extra double-dash is needed:
npm create vite@latest my-vue-app -- --template vue-ts
----

See https://www.shadcn-vue.com/docs/installation/vite
